name: fetch_articles
description: Fetches a predefined list of example news articles and can generate structured collections.
author: ClearCoreAI Contributors

input_spec.description: Only needed for 'generate_article_collection', which expects a list of articles.

articles.description: List of sample articles to be summarized or classified.

capabilities.name: fetch_static_articles
capabilities.description: Returns a hardcoded list of articles.

capabilities.name: generate_article_collection
capabilities.description: Formats the articles into a structured collection object.

usage_guidelines.intended_use: Provides consistent and simple article data for testing summarization and classification pipelines.
usage_guidelines.limitations: Does not fetch real or dynamic news content. Always returns the same articles.
usage_guidelines.safety_notes: No external data sources or sensitive content involved.
